column5: I just purchased a Lowrance LMS 522c iGPS and I was hoping someone could recommend a place that could install it. I live in the Kawathra area.  Thanks
Hutch, no chance of installing it yourself?  It's not very complicated!
Congrats on the purchase. It's no big deal to do it yourself you know?
yea, do it urself.  take an afternoon and have a 12 of beer. maybe have a buddy help. but installing a graph isn't very hard
If you're not going to attempt it yourself, give any of your local marina's a call and they should be able to help you out.
PM "Big Cliff" and see if he's interested in doing it for you.
where do ya live?   if your close to hamilton i'd be willin to give ya a hand
If your worried about a kazillion holes in your hull try one of these:  http://www.cabelas.com/prod-1/0000847010102a.shtml
